name: Nasty Fly 2 – The Impossible Challenge 2015
description:
Use your skill and timing to tap your way through this challenging game. Each tap will uses some of the fly’s power and every jewel you collect will increase his health.

It’s challenging and requires your attention to get just one gold medal. Work hard to achieve the almost impossible three gold stars!

Try beating you friends and enjoy this simple yet addictive little game that’s suitable for both kids and adults and fun for the whole family to enjoy.
